summary: Homepage redesign aligned to the provided Pinterest reference template while enforcing the clinic’s strict brand palette, plus review fixes: hero readability/contrast, replace header logo with the user-provided SVG (fix current issue where only alt text shows), replace hero image with exactly https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/back_pain.png with background removed, fix missing service images by generating unique real physiotherapy photos per service and placing them on all service cards, update hero headline typography (slightly lighter weight + tighter letter spacing), display 4.9 rating from 147 Google reviews, update Reviews/Testimonial content to only 5-star positive detailed reviews from the provided Google Business profile link, embed Google Map iframe in Contact section, remove Facebook icon, correct Instagram handle link, update Sunday hours only, and add/update the Home "Who we are" section placed before "What Our Patients Say" using the user-provided copy (signed by Dr. Roshani Mansuriya) and image https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/dr-banner.jpg; ensure logo.svg renders in primary color #2E0527 across header (desktop + mobile).
architectural_notes: No backend email delivery: use mailto: email button instead of contact form notifications/newsletter emailing.
Content/assets sourced from existing site and Google Business listing; ensure proper attribution/usage rights for photos.

Strict brand palette must be used site-wide for UI components: #2E0527 (primary), #681259 (secondary/CTAs), #B0A8B3 (muted text/borders/icons), #D8CED4 (section backgrounds/cards), #F8F8F8 (main background); maintain high contrast/accessibility.
Use a single consistent modern line icon set/style (e.g., Heroicons/Lucide/Phosphor) and restrict icon colors to the brand palette (no arbitrary colors).

UI polish requirements: services displayed as cards (icon + image + short description), subtle shadows/rounded corners/hover effects, smooth scrolling, and mobile sticky bottom 'Book Appointment' CTA.
Clinic is Utthan Physiotherapy Clinic (Kamrej), not Ahmedabad; ensure NAP and local SEO reflect Kamrej everywhere.

Use updated Google Business share links provided in chat (e.g., https://share.google/50bs8HW3fbEUmyOcc and https://share.google/RJAljVXB4WTdwxAC3) to gather accurate business info/photos in addition to utthan.vercel.app.
Canonical clinic contact details to use everywhere: utthan.health@gmail.com; phone 82000 84101; address: 209, Kashi Plaza, Kamrej Char-rasta, Surat - 394180.
Homepage/hero stat counters must be: 5+ years of experience, 10+ hospitals partnered, 700+ happy patients.
Landing page hero should use a spine image as the primary main hero visual; use a mix of real photos and illustrations where appropriate, aiming for SEO + user-friendly layout.
known_issues: Brand palette not correctly applied in current build (colors differ from provided hex values).
Mobile/menu UI bug: two close icons appear in the menu.
Imagery not displaying (hero/sections/images missing or broken).
Landing page quality is below expectation; needs classic premium layout with one large hero image (like utthan.vercel.app).
Clinic location/NAP currently shows Ahmedabad but should be Kamrej.
Displayed email/phone/address are incorrect (must match provided Kamrej/Surat details).
Homepage stats (experience/happy customers) are incorrect (must be 5+ years, 10+ hospitals, 700+ patients).
Landing page hero has poor color/contrast (dark text on purple gradient) and overall landing page quality is unacceptable; needs premium redesign with spine hero image.
Homepage hero text has poor contrast/readability (dark text blending into background).
Services section missing images (service cards not showing photos).

existing_features.title: Build a responsive, mobile-first marketing website for Utthan Physiotherapy Clinic using the existing website https://utthan.vercel.app/ as the primary source for service details, content, structure, and assets, and the Google Business listing at https://share.google/BQiXX36E04bg7gfuV to gather additional clinic photos, reviews, location details, and business info.

Implement the requested site structure with clear navigation and sections/pages: Homepage (hero + key CTAs), About Us, Services (with dedicated service sections/pages), Conditions We Treat, Therapist Profiles, Testimonials/Reviews, FAQ, and Contact/Location.

Add prominent appointment booking CTAs linking to the clinic’s existing Calendly scheduling link, including a header CTA and mobile-friendly above-the-fold/sticky CTA behavior on key pages (at minimum: homepage).

Replace any contact-form/email-sending functionality with a single Email button/link that uses a mailto: URL to open the visitor’s default email app. The destination email address must be taken from the clinic’s details found in the reference site or Google Business listing; if not available, make the email address a clearly documented, easy-to-edit frontend constant.

Implement on-page and local SEO: unique meta titles and descriptions per page, optimized headings, descriptive image alt text, consistent NAP (clinic name, address, phone) across the site, and schema markup for LocalBusiness, Services, Reviews, and FAQ where applicable.

Create and apply one coherent, professional visual theme suitable for a physiotherapy clinic (calm, clean, authoritative), and enforce it consistently across typography, spacing, components, and section layouts. Avoid blue/purple-heavy styling unless already strongly present in the sourced brand assets.

Implement the user-provided STRICT brand color palette across the entire frontend by updating the Tailwind/shadcn theme tokens (CSS variables used by `primary`, `secondary`, `muted`, `card`, `background`, etc.) so that the site consistently uses: #2E0527 (primary: headings/navbar/footer), #681259 (secondary: CTAs/buttons/highlights), #B0A8B3 (muted text/borders/icons), #D8CED4 (section backgrounds/cards), #F8F8F8 (main background), while maintaining high contrast and accessibility.

Standardize and expand the use of clean modern line icons (Lucide/Heroicons/Phosphor style) across key sections without changing copy/structure: Services, Benefits (pain relief/mobility/recovery), Contact info, FAQs, and Testimonials; ensure icon colors strictly follow the brand palette (no random colors).

Add and render relevant, high-quality physiotherapy imagery (optimized for web, responsive) in the Hero section, each service section/card, and About page sections using assets sourced from https://utthan.vercel.app/ and Google Business photos; ensure every image has descriptive alt text for SEO.

Convert service listings to a more premium card design that includes (per card) an icon, an image, and a short description, plus subtle shadows, rounded corners, hover effects, and clear visual separation between sections—without changing the underlying content or page structure/routes.

Upgrade the Home hero section visual design to feel premium and trust-building by adding a strong background image or a soft gradient derived from the brand colors, improving text hierarchy/overlay readability, and making the “Book Appointment” CTA visually dominant; optionally add trust badges (e.g., Google reviews, years of experience) using existing stats/reviews data already displayed on the site.

Add micro-interactions and mobile-critical polish: button hover animations, card lift on hover, smooth scrolling behavior, and ensure the mobile sticky bottom “Book Appointment” CTA remains touch-friendly, uncluttered, and visually aligned with the strict brand palette (including correct spacing so it does not obscure important content).

Update all clinic NAP/business details across the site to represent **Utthan Physiotherapy Clinic, Kamrej** (not Ahmedabad), and ensure the displayed **email, phone, address, and Google Maps link** are taken from https://utthan.vercel.app/ and the provided Google Business share links (https://share.google/RJAljVXB4WTdwxAC3 and https://share.google/50bs8HW3fbEUmyOcc). Apply the corrected NAP everywhere it appears (header CTAs, footer, contact page, SEO metadata, and schema).

Enforce the user-provided strict brand palette site-wide so the rendered UI colors match exactly: #2E0527, #681259, #B0A8B3, #D8CED4, #F8F8F8. Remove/resolve any conflicting theme token definitions so the deployed build cannot fall back to a different default palette.
Fix the mobile menu UI bug where two close icons appear, ensuring only one close control is visible and functional in the mobile Sheet menu.

Fix missing/broken imagery so that the homepage hero image and service card images reliably display. Ensure all referenced image paths (e.g., hero and services) exist in the frontend static assets and load without 404s.

Upgrade the homepage (landing page) to a more classic, premium layout featuring one prominent large hero image similar in feel to https://utthan.vercel.app/, while keeping the existing site structure/routes intact and retaining prominent booking CTAs.
Update SEO titles/descriptions and any location-based copy to reflect Kamrej (not Ahmedabad), including the Home page and Contact page SEO components.

Update the canonical clinic NAP details in the shared clinic data source so the correct email, phone number, and address are displayed consistently across the entire site (header, footer, contact page, SEO schema, and any mailto/tel links). Use exactly: email "utthan.health@gmail.com", phone "82000 84101", address "209, Kashi Plaza, Kamrej Char-rasta, Surat - 394180".

Redesign the Home (landing) page hero section to a premium, SEO- and user-friendly layout inspired by modern physiotherapy clinic designs (Dribbble/Pinterest style direction), using a spine image as the main hero image. Ensure strong readability and contrast (no dark text on dark/purple gradients) while staying strictly within the existing brand palette.

Correct all homepage “trust/stats” numbers and any related copy site-wide to match: "5+ years of experience", "10+ hospitals partnered", and "700+ happy patients". Remove/replace any incorrect hardcoded stats (including 10+ years experience, 500+ patients, 95% success rate, or any other mismatches).
Remove or correct any remaining Ahmedabad references in user-facing content (including testimonials/reviews and any page copy) so location references consistently reflect Kamrej, Surat.

Add and use relevant images across the website with a mixed approach: real physiotherapy photos where appropriate and clean medical/clinic illustrations where appropriate. Ensure all referenced image paths resolve (no 404s) and every image has descriptive alt text.
Render newly generated images as static frontend assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated` and reference them directly from React components (no backend image routing).

Redesign the Home page layout and section styling to follow the overall look/structure/spacing/typography of the provided Pinterest reference (https://in.pinterest.com/pin/169236898493404697/) while keeping the existing site routes and enforcing the clinic’s strict brand palette (#2E0527, #681259, #B0A8B3, #D8CED4, #F8F8F8).

Fully replace the current Home page hero section design to improve readability and match the new reference layout, ensuring the hero description text is clearly visible with sufficient contrast against its background.
Ensure every service card on the Home page and Services page displays a real physiotherapy photo (not missing/blank), and fix any broken/404 service image asset paths referenced by service data.
Fix the Instagram social link to point to the correct handle: utthan.physio (update the canonical value in the shared clinic info source so all usages are corrected).
Update only the Sunday clinic timing to 9:00 AM – 1:00 PM, leaving all other days/hours unchanged wherever clinic hours are displayed.

Fix the regression where the entire site (homepage hero and all other sections/pages) renders with a black background, and restore the intended light theme using the strict Utthan brand palette so all content is readable.

Ensure the theme tokens and Tailwind/shadcn color variables resolve to the exact approved brand palette values site-wide (#2E0527 primary, #681259 secondary, #B0A8B3 muted, #D8CED4 section/card backgrounds, #F8F8F8 main background), and remove/resolve any conflicting theme definitions that could cause fallback to a dark/black appearance.

Replace the text-only site logo in the header with the provided SVG logo from https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/logo.svg, ensuring the logo can be sized appropriately for desktop/mobile and its colors can be adjusted to match the site’s strict brand palette.

Update the Home page hero image to fully replace the current spine hero image with the provided image https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/back_pain.png, using a background-removed cutout version of that image as the hero visual.

Adjust the Home page hero headline typography for the text “Experience personalized physiotherapy treatment that gets you back to doing what you love” to be less bold and include increased letter spacing so it does not look congested, while keeping strong readability/contrast.

Update the site’s displayed Google rating and review count to show 4.9 rating from 147 Google reviews wherever the aggregate rating is shown (including the Home page trust badge and LocalBusiness schema aggregateRating).
Embed the provided Google Maps iframe in/around the Contact section (Contact page) and style it with responsive CSS so it works well on mobile without horizontal scrolling.
Remove the Facebook social icon/link from the site UI and ensure no Facebook URL remains in the canonical clinic social links data used by the footer/social components.

Update the Home page hero headline typography so the text “Experience personalized physiotherapy treatment that gets you back to doing what you love” uses tighter letter-spacing than the current styling and uses a slightly lighter font weight (less bold), while maintaining strong readability and contrast within the strict brand palette.

Update the on-site Testimonials/Reviews content so it includes only 5-star, positive, most-detailed reviews from the provided Google Business profile link (https://www.google.com/search?q=Utthan+Physiotherapy+Clinic%250D%250A&oq=utthan+Physiotherapy+Clinic&gs_lcrp=EgZjaHJvbWUqBggAEEUYOzIGCAAQRRg7MgcIARAAGIAEMgcIAhAAGIAEMggIAxAAGBYYHjIICAQQABgWGB4yDQgFEAAYhgMYgAQYigUyBggGEEUYPDIGCAcQRRg80gEINDQwNmowajeoAgiwAgHxBXa_F4vseVLy8QV2vxeL7HlS8g&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8#lrd=0xa31c4a35e61fc015:0x623cd7f2c543bf6d,1,,,,) and remove/replace any existing placeholder reviews that are not sourced from that profile.

Generate and add unique, service-specific real physiotherapy photo images for every service in `frontend/src/content/services.ts`, and update each service to reference its own unique image path and descriptive alt text so that all Service Cards on the Home page and Services page display a real image (no missing images and no fallback image).

Update the canonical appointment booking (Calendly) URL to exactly https://calendly.com/utthan-health/30min, and ensure every “Book Appointment” / booking CTA across the site uses this single canonical value (including header CTA and the mobile sticky booking CTA).
Change the header logo color to use the site primary brand color (so the logo renders in #2E0527 / `text-primary`).

Replace the on-site Testimonials/Reviews content so it uses exactly the specific Google reviews provided by the user (authors + review text), and add a “More reviews” link that redirects to https://share.google/NWt2P0T87joSoAzaH.

Update the site header to use the provided SVG logo file (logo.svg from https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/logo.svg) instead of the current inline `UtthanLogo` mark, while keeping the logo themeable (able to render in the primary brand color #2E0527 via `currentColor`/CSS) and appropriately sized for desktop and mobile.

Add a new “Who we are” section to the Home page (route: `/`) and place it immediately before the existing “What Our Patients Say” (Testimonials Preview) section. Pull the “Who we are” section content from https://utthan.vercel.app/ and use the same image that the reference site uses for that section.

Fix the header logo so the SVG logo renders as an image (not the alt text), using the provided logo asset from https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/logo.svg, and ensure it displays correctly on both desktop and mobile header navigation.
Replace the entire Home page “Who we are” section content with the user-provided text and update the section image to https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/dr-banner.jpg.

Replace the existing clinic photo(s) on the About Utthan page (route: `/about`, opened via the “Read Our Full Story” CTA) with the 2 user-uploaded clinic photos, keeping the current layout exactly the same as it is now.
Add the 2 uploaded clinic photos as static frontend assets and reference them directly from the About page React components (no backend image routing).
Update the Footer credit line so it displays exactly “Built with <heart icon> by Madhav Mansuriya” and remove any “using caffeine.ai” text and outbound caffeine.ai link from the footer.
Remove the stray “Built withusing caffeine.ai” (or equivalent) block that appears above the footer, so there is no extra credit/text block rendered between the main page content and the footer.
Ensure the site header displays the provided logo.svg (not alt text) and that the header logo renders in color #2E0527.
Update the About page “Our Story” section image to use the user-uploaded image (image-1.png).

Update the site header to use the uploaded `logo.svg` asset and ensure it renders in the primary brand color (#2E0527) on both desktop and mobile. The logo must render as an actual image/graphic (not alt text) and should not rely on inline `style={{ color: ... }}` on an `` tag (since that does not theme most SVG images). Ensure the logo source path is consistent across the codebase (e.g., avoid mixing `/assets/logo.svg` and `/assets/images/logo.svg`) and that the rendered logo color follows `text-primary` / `currentColor` so it stays aligned with the theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create SEO-optimized, mobile-first clinic website with core pages: Home, About, Services, Conditions We Treat, Therapist Profiles, Testimonials/Reviews, FAQ, Contact/Location
Pull and adapt service details, site structure, and existing assets from https://utthan.vercel.app/ and supplement with photos/reviews/location info from Google Business listing
Add prominent appointment booking CTA with Calendly integration (header + homepage) and mobile-friendly/sticky CTAs
Implement on-page + local SEO: unique meta titles/descriptions, structured headings, descriptive image alt text, consistent NAP, schema markup for LocalBusiness/Services/Reviews/FAQ
Replace contact form/email sending with an Email button using mailto: that opens the user's email app
Add Testimonials/Reviews section importing real Google reviews and displaying them with review schema markup

UI/visual enhancement pass: enforce strict brand palette, add consistent modern line icons, upgrade imagery (hero/services/about) from existing site + Google Business, convert services to icon+image cards, add subtle shadows/hover/micro-interactions, improve hero (background/gradient + dominant Book Appointment), and ensure mobile-friendly sticky bottom CTA without changing content/structure

Update clinic location to Kamrej and refresh business info (email/phone/address, photos) from utthan.vercel.app + latest Google share links; redesign landing page to classic premium big-hero-image style and fix UI regressions (wrong palette, duplicate menu close icons, missing images)
Correct clinic contact details site-wide (email/phone/address) and update homepage stats to: 5+ years experience, 10+ hospitals partnered, 700+ happy patients

Redesign landing page to a premium, SEO/user-friendly layout inspired by Dribbble/Pinterest, using a spine image as the main hero image and adding relevant downloaded images (photos/illustrations where appropriate)

Redesign the full homepage to follow the provided Pinterest reference template style (overall layout/sections/spacing/typography) while using the clinic’s strict brand color palette; fully change the hero section to match the new layout and ensure readable text contrast
Add real physiotherapy photos to Services (ensure each service has an image and assets render correctly)
Fix Instagram social link to point to the correct handle: utthan.physio (currently links to wrong handle)
Update only Sunday clinic timing to 9:00–1:00 (leave other days unchanged)
Use the provided SVG logo (https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/logo.svg) so colors/size can be adjusted as needed
Add Google Maps embed (provided iframe) in/around the Contact section for directions and style it via CSS for responsiveness
Update displayed Google rating/review count to 4.9 rating from 147 Google reviews and reflect it in trust badges/hero as applicable
Remove the Facebook social icon/link from the site (clinic is not on Facebook)
Replace the current hero image with https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/back_pain.png with background removed and use it as the primary hero visual
Adjust hero headline typography: make the headline less bold and add letter spacing to reduce the congested look
Curate and update Reviews/Testimonial content using only 5-star positive, most-detailed Google reviews from the provided Google Business profile link
Generate and add unique, service-specific real physiotherapy photo images for every service card and ensure assets render correctly across Home + Services pages
Update the appointment booking CTA to use the correct Calendly link: https://calendly.com/utthan-health/30min (apply wherever booking links appear)
Update the header SVG logo styling so the logo color uses the primary brand color (#2E0527)

Replace Testimonials/Reviews content with exactly the specific Google reviews provided by the user, and add a 'More reviews' link redirecting to the Google Business profile share link https://share.google/NWt2P0T87joSoAzaH
Add a "Who we are" section on the Home page (placed before "What Our Patients Say"), pulling the same content and image from https://utthan.vercel.app/

Fix header SVG logo rendering (currently shows alt text) and replace the full Home "Who we are" section content with the user-provided copy, using https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/dr-banner.jpg as the section image
Replace the images on the About Utthan page (opened via 'Read Our Full Story') with the provided clinic photos, keeping the current layout unchanged
Remove the stray “Built withusing caffeine.ai” block that appears above the footer (keep footer clean; do not render this block outside the footer)
Update footer credit line to exactly: “Built with <heart icon> by Madhav Mansuriya” (replacing the current incorrect footer text)
Update the About/Our Story section to use the user-provided image (replace the current Our Story image with the given one)
